exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
push=(title,url,type1,type2)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: type1,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
			}
	});
push("🔖小说专区🔖",null,1,1)
push("最近更新",`{{getUrl()}}novel/common?type=newest<,&page={{page+1}}>`,1,1)
push("最近上架",`{{getUrl()}}novel/common?type=last_published<,&page={{page+1}}>`,1,0.39)
push("原创首发",`{{getUrl()}}novel/common?type=original<,&page={{page+1}}>`,1,0.39)
	arList=["都市激情","校园春色","乡村爱情","系统异能","家庭乱伦","穿越重生","经典武侠","同人改编","科学幻想","东方玄幻","娱乐明星","历史架空","西方魔幻","贤者小说"]
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`{{getUrl()}}novel/all?theme=${index+1}&page={{page}}
`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
		push("🔖漫画专区🔖",null,1,1)
			push('最新🌊上架',`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0
`,1,1)

	push('收藏',`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=collect_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0
`,1,0.25)

	push('观看量',`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=view_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,0.25)
	prList=["日本漫画"]
	orList=["短篇","单本","同人"]
		prList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+1}&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,1)
	orList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+1}&category_sub=${index}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
		});

		 mrList=["韩国H漫"]
	arList=["剧情","校园","爱情","BL","奇幻","调教","乱伦"]
	mrList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,1)
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=${index+1}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page=1&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
				});
				push("🔖视频专区🔖",null,1,1)
				push('全部🌊视频',`{{getUrl()}}mv/all?page={{page}}`,1,1)
				push('热门🌊视频',`{{getUrl()}}mv/hot?page={{page}}`,1,0.35)
push('最近🌊更新',`{{getUrl()}}mv/new`,1,0.35)
     push('排行榜',`{{getUrl()}}mv/rank`,1,1)
			krList=[["国产视频","1",0],["日本AV","2",0],["H动漫","3",0],["偷拍自拍","1",1],["次元萝莉","1",2],["国产传媒","1",3],["主播福利","1",4],["吃瓜爆料","1",5],["无码流出","2",1],["高清AV","2",2],["同人热播","3",1],["3D动漫","3",2]]
				krList.map(([teg,ure,o])=>{
		push(teg,`{{getUrl()}}mv/all?keyword=&title=&actor=0&merchant=&category=${ure}&category_sub=${o}&page_num=1&tag=0&sort_field=id&sort_order=1&limit=48&page={{page}}`,1,0.25)
})
//java.log(JSON.stringify(sort))
JSON.stringify(sort)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if (baseUrl['match'](/mv/)) { p = result['match'](/data\-url\=\"(.*)\"\s/); p = p ? p[0x1] : 0x1; jy=`{{getUrl()}}` let name = java['getString']('h1@text'); img=`{{@@#mse@data-poster}}` rq=`{{@@.mt-2@span.4@text}}` xh=`{{@@.mt-2@span.6@text}}` bf=`{{@@.mt-2@span.5@text}}` let intro = java['getString']('.mt-2!0@span.1@text'); let kind = java['getString']('.underline@text'); java.log(img) if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

${name}

📆 日期：${rq}

🎥 播放：${bf}次

📩 收藏：${xh}

🔖 标签：${kind}

🏷 简介：${intro}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待'); } '【刷新正文】播放\n✅直链:\n' + p; } else { java['getString']('main@html'); }

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
if (x == 0) {
    java.getElements('.items-start');
}else if(x==1){
    java.getElements('.dx-novel-list@li@a');
}
else if(x==2){
    java.getElements('.dx-video-list@li');
}</js>
ruleSearch.name:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
if (x == 0) {
  java.getString(".dx-title@textNodes");
} else if (x== 2){
java.getString(".text-default@text");
} else if(x==1){
   java.getString(".truncate.0@text");
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾');  java.getElements('.toggleVolume,ul@.cursor-pointer');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/mv/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	   book.type = 64;
    java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
 if(x==0){
'{{getUrl()}}'+'novel/all?key_word={{key}}<,&page={{page}}>'
}else if(x==1){
'{{getUrl()}}'+'comic/all?key_word={{key}}<,&page={{page}}>'
}if(x==2){
'{{getUrl()}}'+'mv/all?key_word={{key}}<,&page={{page}}>'
}
</js>
